short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AppEQ provides actionable Customer Insights for Sales, Success & Support teams in B2B Organizations, within your Inbox, CRM etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AppEQ enables post sales teams like CSM /AM teams drive revenue retention and expansion with additional customer insights and automation capabilities on their Inbox and CRM like Salesforce, Hubspot. 

With this light weight plugin, AppEQ delivers features like
- Customer Account Portfolio tracking
- Customer 360 on top of Inbox, CRM & others
- In-the-moment customer insights to help CSM/AM get information easily and not miss out important signals. 
-Automation to help drive up proactive customer engagement

AppEQ is SOC 2 Type II, GDPR, ISO/IEC 27001 certified and adheres to strict and best in class data security practices.
